segments.text: Can I get you something to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , that's okay , I already have a coke.Why don't you have a seat , you look like you've been on your feet all day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess I could take a break.So , how do you like Denver ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's great ! The mountains here are beautiful and the skiing is spectacular.Have you been here for a long time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you do for a living ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I manage one of the ski lodges.It ' s a great job , I can spend a lot of my time outdoors , and I also get to ski for free all season .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , talk about job perks ! That's great . I would like to do something exciting like that.But I am only an accountant.Not too much excitement there.huh ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's okay.If it weren't for you accountants , nobody would have the money to go skiing !
segments.speaker: S1
